CAN YOU HEAR THE DEAFENING SILENCE? That is the sound of "Moderate Muslims". In over 20 countries around the world. Infidels are raped, beaten, killed, bodies dragged down the street paraded, as Islamo-lunatics scream "Allahu Akbar! Allahu Akbar!" Why? Is it because someone told the truth about their pedophile "prophet"? Islamo-neanderthals crawl up buildings, attack police, hurl rocks, rip
apart and burn the American flag, jumping up and down chanting like apes - demanding an end to free speech. Can you hear the deafening silence, as "Moderate Muslims" FAIL to hold these savages accountable? Where are you, oh "religion of peace" as my inbox is FLOODED WITH DEATH THREATS FROM MUSLIMS SO DEVOUT? Will Facebook delete this message because I have offended you? Will the Obama government try to silence me as part of their campaign of appeasement? Did you think your childish tantrums would compromise our freedoms and bend us to your will? Did you think we would submit? THIS IS WAR. If you are reading and still on the fence, remember this: "In any conflict between the civilized man and the savage - back the civilized man". There will be no deafening silence from me, or my friends. WE WILL DEFEAT YOU. We will END SHARIA IN OUR TIME. We will bring Political Islam to its knees. With our intellectual, creative, technological, moral and military superiority, we will destroy your power structures, neutralize your leaders, expose your crimes, weed out our "leaders" who stand beside you and crush your institutions. This 1,400 year nightmare of Islamic brutality has gone on long enough. THIS IS THE BEGINNING OF THE END. Political Islam must go.
